mlmod.config.category.messages.tooltip: §fMineland messages independent of the player's minigame
mlmod.config.option.ignored_players.tool:
§fList of players whose messages will not be shown
in DM, Creative and Donate chats
mlmod.config.option.ignored_worlds.toolt:
§fList of worlds not shown in /ad advertisements.
Specify the world's numeric ID, or the world name
by adding §3':' §fbefore the name.
Example: §3:pvp parkour
mlmod.config.option.reward_storage: 'There is something in the Secret Storage...'
mlmod.config.option.unanswered_asks.tool:
§fNotification about unanswered asks. Example:
Questions » 5 unanswered questions in the system total - /asks
mlmod.config.option.unread_mail.tooltip:
§fNotification about unread mail. Example:
Mail » Received 5 new mails - /mail read
mlmod.config.option.login_check.tooltip:
Show messages like "Checking in progress, please wait"
 or "Enter code from the image into chat"
mlmod.config.option.chat_player_interact: Click on message to interact with player §f§o(?)

§fIf enabled, clicking on a message in Creative and Donate chats
will open a menu where you can
reply, block, report, copy, and search the player's messages
mlmod.config.option.ads.tooltip: §fAdvertisements about Mineland TG channel, Discord, ranks, etc
mlmod.config.option.message_collector.to:
§fIf enabled, the mod will be record player messages from
DM, Creative and Donate chats into the §7'mlmodData.txt'§f file.
Use §3/msgs §ffor more info
mlmod.config.option.pm_notification.tool: §fThe mod will play a sound when someone DMs you via /msg while Minecraft is unfocused
mlmod.config.option.show_world_id.toolti: §fDisplays the numeric ID of a world advertised via /ad
mlmod.config.option.chat_formatting_cc.t: §fWill replace '§3Creative-chat §8»§f' in the message with text from the field, if any
mlmod.config.option.chat_formatting_dc.t: §fWill replace '§2Donate-chat §8»§f' in the message with text from the field, if any
mlmod.config.option.play_sound.tooltip: §fShift+RMB to play sound from a book with text
mlmod.config.option.sound_command.toolti: §fAllows searching and playing sounds regardless of /dev mode
§fTime in ticks to be set in dev mode (18000 - night)
mlmod.config.option.detect_mineland: Detect if you're playing on Mineland §f§o(?)
mlmod.config.option.detect_mineland.tool: §fDisables some MLMod functions if you're not playing on Mineland. See §3'Mineland IPs'§f to configure the ip list
mlmod.config.option.mineland_ips.tooltip: §fList of Mineland IPs that the mod should detect. Separate the IPs with a comma
mlmod.config.option.messages_in_actionba: Display some messages in the ActionBar §f§o(?)
§fSome of the messages will be displayed above the hotbar
mlmod.messages.creative_mode_needed: §cYou must be in creative mode for this
mlmod.messages.ignore.player_added: Player §7%s §fis §aadded§f to MLMod ignore list. §a§nAdd§f on §cMi§ene§bla§and§f?
mlmod.messages.ignore.player_removed: Player §7%s §fis §cremoved§f from MLMod ignore list. §c§nRemove§f on §cMi§ene§bla§and§f?
mlmod.command_error: §cAn error occurred while executing the command
mlmod.messages.collector.info: Messages are stored in the '§6.minecraft\mlmodData.txt§f' file. §aClick to open
mlmod.messages.collector.search_guide: §fUse §7/msgs find §3<query (optional)> <dc/cc/pc/ls (pm)/reply> §fto find last §350 messages §fby content or nickname
mlmod.messages.show_world_ads: Show world list in this message
mlmod.messages.ignorelist.info: §7Click on a nickname to remove the player, or on this text to add one
mlmod.messages.use_excl_mark_to_cc: §7Global chat on Creative+ is disabled. Use the config setting to write in §3Creative §7chat via §f!
mlmod.messages.sound.usage_info: If pitch or volume is needed, both values must be specified
mlmod.messages.sound.click_to_play_sound: §aLMB§7 to play the sound §8(it will be saved in chat sent message history)
mlmod.messages.head.head_given: Player head %s given §8(open your inventory to refresh it)
mlmod.messages.nightmode.enable_in_confi: §cEnable the "Night mode in /dev" setting to activate night mode
mlmod.messages.itemeditor.empty_hand: §cYou must be holding an item in your hand
mlmod.messages.vars.info: §7Add a variable using the §8/varsave§7 command and holding it in hand, or using a bind in settings
mlmod.messages.vars.var_not_saved: §cFailed to save variable from your hand. Maybe this type is not supported
mlmod.var.text.desc:
A variable type that can store
text values and color codes.

Values:
> Text (type in chat while holding,
supports color codes)
mlmod.var.number.desc:
A variable type that can store
an integer (whole number) value.

Values:
> Type a number in chat while
holding to store it in the variable
> Type time in chat to store the time in
ticks to the variable (Example - "3s")
> Type pi to set the number π
> Type e to set the number e (Euler's number)
mlmod.var.var.desc:
A variable type that can store anything.
The value of a dynamic variable can be
set with a Set Variable block. Dynamic
variables with the same name all store
the same value.

Values:
> Name (type in chat while holding, use
names including tags like %player% for
player-specific variables).
> Save Property (sneak + right click
while holding, a 'SAVE' tag makes the
variable save permanently).
> Dynamic variables without the 'SAVE'
tag will be deleted shortly.
